document_data.caption: The surgeon in the depths of Blackdagger's floating fortress.
document_data.name: Redolent Surgeon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Redolent Surgeon''' was a pirate that served aboard the ''[[Black Scourge]]'', a [[skyship]] captained by Pirate King [[Bartholomew Blackdagger]] during the first half of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. Like Blackdagger and all of his crew, the surgeon was cursed with existence as an [[undead]] monstrosity, bound to a hidden [[Pirate King's Retreat|lair]] within [[Pirates' Skyhold]] for decades following his mortal death.
document_data.History: The undead surgeon was destroyed in the {{YearlinkName|1479}} by the [[Heroes of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]], when the adventurers raided Pirates' Skyhold under the employ of [[Company Yargo]].
